category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > LTE IoT
name: mikroe.click.lteiot11
short_description: LTE IoT 11 Click is a compact add-on board with an optimized global coverage module, as it supports a comprehensive set of bands required for global deployment. This board features the TX62-W, a global MTC module from Thales. It delivers global LTE-M, NB-IoT (NB1 and NB2) connectivity from a single SKU, and it is the first Thales product to adopt a revolutionary “Things” footprint. Besides, it integrates an embedded GNSS multi-constellation, state-of-the-art secure services, and more.
